casebody.data:
Scott STEFFY, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
The BOARD OF HOSPITAL MANAGERS OF HURLEY MEDICAL CENTER, a/k/a Hurley Hospital, a/k/a Hurley Medical Center, Steve Sitar, and Cliff Hooker, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 156953
COA: 333945 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the November 21, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
